DOC.brief_summary: In history TKA several different type prosthetic design evolve order optimize knee function total knee replacement . The common difference prosthetic design revolve around issue concern preservation cruciate ligament . The popular prosthesis posterior stabilize prosthesis ( PS ) cruciate ligament resect posterior cruciate retain prosthesis ( CR ) ACL resect PCL preserve . Both prosthetic design show excellent clinical result literature . In knee role cruciate ligament insure anterior/posterior stability , study also show , cruciate ligament contain proprioceptive mechanism control joint kinematics essential accurate knee function . One could therefore imagine prosthetic design preserve cruciate ligament would superior prosthetic design ACL ACL/PCL resect achieve good clinical result patient satisfaction . Only prosthetic design , preserve cruciate ligament , available market . However study base fluoroscopic assay gait analysis show prosthetic design superior cruciate sacrifice design preserve normal knee kinematics activity daily live TKA . Studies , patient receive two different type prosthesis knee , also show bi-cruciate retain TKA 's prefer , compare constrain prosthetic design . The new Vanguard XP TKA system ( Biomet® , Warsaw , Indiana , USA ) development Vanguard TKA system , show good clinical result early study . With new Vanguard XP system cruciate ligament preserve . In theory result natural feeling knee stability proprioceptive signal cruciate ligament preserve . In order investigate potential benefit new prosthetic design , clinical radiological result knee receive Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis compare . In study wish investigate : 1 . If use Vanguard XP prosthesis influence migration femur- tibial component measure Radiostereometric Analysis ( RSA ) compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . 2 . If use Vanguard XP prosthesis result increase participant knee function , satisfaction quality life compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . 3 . If use Vanguard XP prosthesis influence radiologic sign osteolysis , complication rate revision rate compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . This project carry randomized control double-blinded trial , clinical radiological outcome treatment knee osteoarthritis insertion either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis compare .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Vanguard XP Vanguard CR Total Knee Arthroplasties . A Trial Evaluating Early Component Migration RSA Patient Reported Outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Objectives Primary objective The primary objective study compare stability fixation RSA Vanguard XP Vanguard CR . Secondary objective Secondary objective study assess patient report outcomes Vanguard XP comparison Vanguard CR . 2 . Background The primary goal Total Knee Replacement surgery treatment knee osteoarthritis reduce pain restore knee function ( stability range motion ) order increase patient mobility quality life . At Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre , patient severe osteoarthritis knee treat insertion cement total knee prosthesis anterior cruciate ligament resect posterior cruciate ligament retain ( CR ) . In history TKA several different type prosthetic design evolve order optimize knee function total knee replacement . Most difference prosthetic design revolve around issue concern preservation cruciate ligament . The popular prosthesis use posterior stabilize prosthesis ( PS ) cruciate ligament resect posterior cruciate retain prosthesis ( CR ) ACL resect PCL preserve . Both prosthetic design show excellent clinical result literature . In knee role cruciate ligament insure anterior/posterior stability , study also show , cruciate ligament contain proprioceptive mechanism control joint kinematics essential accurate knee function . One could therefore imagine prosthetic design preserve cruciate ligament would superior prosthetic design ACL ACL/PCL resect achieve good clinical result patient satisfaction . Only prosthetic design , preserve cruciate ligament , available market . However study base fluoroscopic assay gait analysis show prosthetic design superior cruciate sacrifice design preserve normal knee kinematics activity daily live TKA13-16 . Studies , patient receive two different type prosthesis knee , also show bi-cruciate retain TKA 's prefer , compare constrain prosthetic designs17-19 . The new Vanguard XP TKA system ( Biomet® , Warsaw , Indiana , USA ) development Vanguard TKA system , show good clinical result earlier studies11-12 . With new Vanguard XP system cruciate ligament preserve . In theory result natural feeling knee stability proprioceptive signal cruciate ligament preserve . In order investigate potential benefit new prosthetic design , clinical radiological result knee receive Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis compare . In study wish investigate : 1 ) If use Vanguard XP prosthesis influence migration femur- tibial component measure Radiostereometric Analysis ( RSA ) compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . 2 ) If use Vanguard XP prosthesis result increase participant knee function , satisfaction quality life compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . 3 ) If use Vanguard XP prosthesis influence radiologic sign osteolysis , complication rate revision rate compare Vanguard CR prosthesis . 3 . Device description Please see separate application premarket test . The Vanguard XP ( XP tibial tray XP tibial bearing use study ) yet CE-marked . 4 . Project design Project type This project carry randomized control double-blinded trial , clinical radiological outcome treatment knee osteoarthritis insertion either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis compare . After informed consent obtain , participant randomize receive either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis . Allocation patient one two treatment group do operate room surgical verification cruciate ligament intact . Non-transparent envelope use randomization process . Participants unaware prosthesis receive research coordinator handle collect questionnaire postoperatively also unaware prosthesis patient receive . Time schedule Recruitment participant project expect begin October 2013 soon permission local Ethics Committee National Board Health obtain . 50 participant randomize ( 25 participant study group ) . Recruitment expect complete period 1 year . Inclusion randomization approximately 5 participant per month consider realistic regard logistical capacity additional necessary study study . The project expect complete 10 year recruitment last participant ( fall 2024 ) . Participant termination At participant choose leave project time . Participants also withdraw project time , consider necessary investigator , e.g . event deep infection lead replacement prosthesis long-term immobilisation comorbidity . If participant withdrawn rescind consent , `` Lost Follow-up '' case report form complete detail reason participant 's withdrawal . Data record Data relevant project register data sheet . An individual data sheet keep recruited participant . Data also aggregate store electronically . The storage data do accord rule post Danish Data Protection Agency . This project notify approved Danish Data Protection Agency recruitment partisipants initiate . 5 . Participant population 50 participant knee osteoarthritis set receive primary cement total knee prosthesis Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre . Number participant 50 recruited patient ( 25 group ) randomize receive either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis . Patients may exclude intraoperatively , randomization , one cruciate ligament find miss totally rupture . We estimate 20 % enrolled patient exclude due , therefore recruitement 60 patient need . Prior recruitement patient randomize study conduct pilot study include 5 patient receive Vanguard XP . The study 's primary outcome measure implant migration measure RSA . If minimally relevant total migration prosthesis measure RSA set 0.2 mm1 total 18 participant must enrol study group show statistically significant difference ( 95 % confidence , 80 % power ) . In study 2 x 25 participant include . This insure sufficient statistical power despite dropout 20 % . The power calculation base reach sufficient power comparison two study group carry . Inclusion criterion • Patients primary knee osteoarthritis set receive primary unilateral cement total knee arthroplasty Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre . - Participants must > 18 year age . - Participants must able speak understand Danish . - Participants must able give informed consent cognitively intact . - Participants must expect able complete postoperative control . - Participants must severe comorbidities , ASA-score ≤ 3 . Exclusion criterion - Terminal illness . - Rheumatoid arthritis . - Prior open surgery affect knee . - Prior arthroscopic surgery surgery anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament ( meniscal surgery lead exclusion ) . - Prior high-energy trauma affect knee . - Prior history anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament rupture . - Suspicion anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament rupture clinical examination . - Documented osteoporosis patient active medical treatment . - Comorbidity alter pain perception ( e.g . DM neuropathy ) . - Participants develop deep infection follow-up period exclude study . Regarding RSA assay • Participants le 3 Tantalum bead visible around Femur- Tibia component RSA assay exclude migration measurement . Data regard secondary objective subject include . Regarding intraoperative exclusion • If anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament find miss totally rupture direct intraoperative visualization , patient exclude point receive department 's standard prosthesis ( Vanguard CR posterior cruciate ligament intact ) . Regarding contraception • Patients receive knee prosthesis often reach non-fertile age ( 50+ ) . In case fertile woman participate study ensure pregnant . Intervention group After allocate either two group , participant receive either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis . After discharge outpatient control carry 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year postoperatively . RSA assay perform postoperatively 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year . Patients meet inclusion criterion wish participate study receive standard treatment knee osteoarthritis institution , cement TKA outpatient follow-up 3 month postoperatively . 6 . Methods The study conduct accordance CONSORT statement . The project 5 step 1 . Project information sign consent surgery . 2 . Intraoperative assessment cruciate ligament exclusion patient anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament find miss totally rupture . 3 . Surgery insertion either Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis . Tantalum bead place bone around femur- tibial component . Surgery perform Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre . 4 . Postoperatively , participant admit dedicate fast track arthroplasty unit receive standard treatment TKA discharge . Discharge criterion ability walk > 70 crutch well , ability get bed well chair , sufficient oral pain treatment . Before discharge RSA perform . 5 . 3 month 1 , 2 , 5. 10 year postoperatively participant see outpatient basis . Demographic data , surgery time length hospital stay also register . Surgery procedure Surgery perform described manufacturer 's technical guide . After randomization participant receive either cement Vanguard XP Vanguard CR prosthesis . One three senior surgeon ( Henrik Husted , Kristian Otte , Anders Troelsen ) dedicate knee arthroplasty surgery perform operation assistant . Technique : A standard medial Para patellar incision use . Femur tibial surface prepare use standard cut guide . When CR prosthesis use ACL resect PCL spar . When XP prosthesis use ACL PCL spar . The XP prosthesis use tibail tray bear surface purpose . A minimum six 1 mm Tantalum bead place distal femur proximal tibia . A sawbones phantom study detect optimal placement bead perform prior operation first patient . Femur- tibial component cement bone . Soft tissue balance perform ensure optimal stability ROM . An E1-vitamin enriched polyethylene tibial liner use . Resurfacing patella perform case . Joint capsule subcutis close use tie nut . Skin close staple . No drain use . Postoperatively , participant receive standard pain treatment rehabilitation discharge2 . Measurements RSA Since 1970ies , RSA use measure migration implant relation surround bone . Peroperatively , 1 mm Tantalum bead place bone surround prosthesis use specialized instrument . Postoperatively , simultaneous radiographs two different angle use visualize distance prosthesis Tantalum bead three-dimensionally use special computer software programme ( Model Based RSA ) 3 . Then migration prosthesis time calculate . Migration femur- tibia component calculate . Radiographs perform Radiological Department , Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre . Participants place supine position lower leg place premade cushion . The x-ray tube place 145 cm floor mutual angle 44 degree ( +/-22 degree relative sagittal axis participant ) path beam x-ray tube pass knee participant . Standard x-ray film place calibration box design Model Based RSA . Using Model Based RSA software pre-scanned model prosthesis , radiograph use establish three-dimensional coordinate presenting relation prosthesis Tantalum bead . Distances Tantalum bead prosthesis calculate subsequently use calculate migration prosthesis time . In order able calculate migration prosthesis , least three Tantalum bead around femur- tibial component visual RSA radiograph . If achieve , participant exclude migration measurement . In order address issue least 6 Tantalum bead place distal femur proximal tibia preoperatively . 7 . Registrations All registration do prospectively . Primary objective Migration/rotation : Migration prosthesis measure RSA3 . Implant-migration/rotation define change distance prosthesis Tantalum bead time . Participant perceive knee function : Participant perceive knee function evaluate preoperatively 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up use validated Forgotten Joint Score ( FJS ) 4 Oxford Knee Score ( OKS ) 5 . Secondary objective Health relate quality life ( HRQoL ) : Participant perceive HRQoL evaluate preoperatively 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up use validated EQ-5D Range motion ( ROM ) : Active passive knee ROM measure preoperatively 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up use goniometer6 . Periprosthetic osteolysis : Radiological sign periprosthetic osteolysis evaluate plain radiograph 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up . Knee pain : Knee pain evaluate 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up use Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) 7 0 represent pain 10 represent bad pain imaginable . Satisfaction knee : At 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year participant ask describe satisfaction knee use VAS-scale . 0 use participant maximally dissatisfied knee . Expectations/fulfilment expectation : Preoperatively participant ask expectation forthcoming knee replacement . At 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up , participant ask evaluate well knee replacement meet expectation use VAS-scale . 0 used expectation fulfil 10 used expectation fully fulfil . Surgery time : Duration start incision staple place document . Length hospital stay : Length hospital stay define day surgery discharge document . Complications : Thrombo-embolic complication , wound heal complication , infection , nerve palsy revision document . Peroperative release : If peropertive release ( medial , lateral , posterior ) perform order obtain stability , document . 8 . Risks adverse effect The risk study relate : 1 ) Insertion Tantalum bead bone , 2 ) Additional radiation relation RSA-assays , 3 ) The use new prosthetic design . 1 . Insertion Tantalum bead bone order carry RSA-assays do increasingly last 25 year . In literature , side effect report regard insertion Tantalum bead use RSA-assays . Tantalum also use suture staple proven bio-convertible without tendency corrode bone8-9 . 2 . In study RSA-assays carry postoperatively 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 year follow-up . At 3 month follow-up additional RSA-assay perform ensure precision setup . This mean participant expose 5 additional RSA-assays . The radiation dose use RSA-assay equivalent conventional radiograph , 0.2 mSV . Each participant therefore expose additional radiation dose 1.4 mSV . The background radiation Denmark ≈ 2-3 mSV/year . The additional radiation participant expose study equivalent 6-8 month background radiation . Therefore believe RSA-assays cause additional risk participant study10 . 3 . In study new prosthetic design , Vanguard XP TKA system ( Biomet® , Warsaw , Indiana , USA ) , test . The Vanguard XP system obtain FDA-approval USA development Vanguard system , show good clinical result earlier studies11-12 . We therefore find highly relevant investigate result primary total knee replacement Vanguard XP TKA system . We believe use new prosthetic design cause additional risk participant study . DOC.criteria: Patients primary knee osteoarthritis set receive primary unilateral cement total knee arthroplasty Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre . Participants must > 18 year age . Participants must able speak understand Danish . Participants must able give informed consent cognitively intact . Participants must expect able complete postoperative control . Participants must severe comorbidities , ASAscore ≤ 3 . Terminal illness . Rheumatoid arthritis . Prior open surgery affect knee . Prior arthroscopic surgery surgery anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament ( meniscal surgery lead exclusion ) . Prior highenergy trauma affect knee . Prior history anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament rupture . Suspicion anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament rupture clinical examination . Documented osteoporosis patient active medical treatment . Comorbidity alter pain perception ( e.g . DM neuropathy ) . Participants develop deep infection followup period exclude study . Regarding RSA assay • Participants le 3 Tantalum bead visible around Femur Tibia component RSA assay exclude migration measurement . Data regard secondary objective subject include . Regarding intraoperative exclusion • If anterior and/or posterior cruciate ligament find miss totally rupture direct intraoperative visualization , patient exclude point receive department 's standard prosthesis ( Vanguard CR posterior cruciate ligament intact ) . Regarding contraception • Patients receive knee prosthesis often reach nonfertile age ( 50+ ) . In case fertile woman participate study ensure pregnant .
